discountSubtext: It's a one-time offer! Don't miss it!
pricingSubtext: Unlock your personalized program by selecting one of our flexible plan options below.
whatsIncludedSubtext: The perfect combination of tips and tricks for the fastest and lasting results
whatsIncludedItems: Specifically health plan based on your lifestyle
Recipes and supplements to balance your body
An abundance of insights and tricks
Support during your journey to ensure optimal results

testimonials.name: Maria
testimonials.text: “This plan helped me lose 10kg in 3 months! Simple and effective.”

testimonials.name: Anna
testimonials.text: “I feel more energetic, my cravings are gone, and I love the recipes!”

testimonials.name: Sandra
testimonials.text: “The 12-month plan was the best investment in my health I've made.”

faqItems.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faqItems.answer: Yes, all plans come with a cancel-anytime guarantee. No hidden fees.

faqItems.question: Do I need to follow diet strictly?
faqItems.answer: No! We adapt your plan to your preferences and flexibility.

faqItems.question: What do I get after payment?
faqItems.answer: You'll receive a personalized 5-day plan, tips, and a bonus recipe book (depending on your plan).
